column2: Really good coffee and bagels with vegan options! Super friendly staff :) and nice deck outside with seating

Tallios is a phenomenal shop with great espresso and an incredible staff. They introduced us to the Bay View community and got us excited about what's to come. I'm excited to see if they can find more local bakeries to source pastries!
blueberry smoothie was good! outdoor seating is nice. phone chargers inside while you wait. POC owned!

Staff was so accommodating and the drinks were all amazing. I would go out of my way to come back here. I had the chai mocha and my friend had the regular mocha. It was the perfect way to start the day

Have an amazing experience here. I had never tried the matcha tea which the owner recommended and I'm so glad he did because it was delicious. They have outdoor seating which is very nice and indoor seating as well. We'll definitely be going back here the prices are more than fair and the service is super friendly glad I found this neat little spot.
Alton is an absolute treasure. Thoughtful, knowledgeable on coffee and a caring member of the community.
The attention is very nice. Delicious coffee accompanied with a good brownie. I will definitely come back.
Local gem of a place I discovered today! Owner & staff make you feel welcome 😊 The black tea is smooth & good as I'm particular about my tea! Check out this local shop & all it has to offer! …

Drove out of the way to check this place out only to find they're shut down until "late August". One star because owner needs to update your online presence and update hours on Google. If you care about your customers, you should probably let them know know they don't waste time trying to visit. Will happily come back and edit this review once they're back opened.

Hello, we are so sorry that you took time to come visit us and we were closed. We have taken your suggestion and are more present online and on our social media. We are temporarily serving our coffee on our parklet and hope you can come visit us when we fully reopen. We truly appreciate the communities support.

Really great shop and owners! I stopped in on a Saturday morning, when other restaurants and cafes are normally closed in the neighborhood. They have an outdoor seating area. I ordered an iced caramel latte, which was delicious, and I would definitely come again!
Cool brother  with some SF history to tell. Thank you for your service.  SF native and now in ATL

We have enjoyed Tallio's Coffee for over a year now and continue to enjoy the quality and taste of Tallio's beans. I highly recommend their coffee from a local small business owner who could use the business.

Great way to wake up on Independence Day for my last day in the bay! The staff was friendly and welcoming, the coffee delicious, and they had free WiFi. The owner is really cool and told me his goal is to open upscale coffee shops in lower income neighborhoods around the bay. Very cool spot to grab a cuppa!
Beautiful place, delicious coffee.. Greetings from Turkey

The coffee is very good, the place is warm and beautifully decorated. The service leaves a lot to be desired. Almost if you disturb them, not at all friendly, which is the opposite of what I expected in a small neighborhood cafe. If you are the owner and you read this review and want to know more about my experience please contact me via email. I will gladly answer you back.

Hi Music, I am the owner at Tallio’s Coffee & Tea and like to hear more about your experience you had at our coffeeshop.  Sorry in advance. I like to invite you to visit us and chat with you. We want to treat everyone with deep respect and offer great service. That’s what we represent. Hope to see you soon.
Great little spot and excellent coffee.  Got to chat with the owners and love their passion for their coffee and their neighborhood.
their coffees are half the price of starbucks and taste better

The order came out quick and iced latte was delicious as ever! The owner of the shop was friendly and accommodating. His staff was also very quick with his job and so creative. I love this shop so much!
Great spot! Can sometimes be a little busy, but espresso is good. Lots of room to work. The service is quick and the staff are friendly and very creative!
Do yourself a favor and order their Vietnamese iced coffee. It’s amazing! Also, the staff are so kind and just love this coffee shops presence in the neighborhood!
Cute store. Very friendly owner. Nice vibes overall.
Wonderful business doing excellent work in this community
If you like you blondie chock full of goodness this is the place for you!
Googled for a local coffee place after going to Flora Grub. Talked with the owners. Dedicated to serving their local community. Plus good coffee!
friendly staff, nice selection of good coffee drinks and pastries.  banana bread was great
Thank you so much for your review! We are so happy you enjoyed it all.
Tallio's delivers...
Great coffee and Tea
Great vibes!
Terrific  Teas
Bad place. They don't pay their workers. They hire undocumented immigrants and exploit them so as not to pay them. Bad place. I would never recommend it
